about.summary: Converts between Gregorian dates and other calendar systems.

name: convertdate
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "2.1.0" %}

package:
  name: convertdate
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: convertdate-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/fitnr/convertdate/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6e10a6d0484837a8383d72b7f39e3b3f4c43c0be1a047c858cba6467ddf135ce
  patches:
    - win_charmap.patch  # [win and py>27]

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - ephem
    - pytz

test:
  imports:
    - convertdate
    - convertdate.data

about:
  home: https://github.com/scrapinghub/convertdate
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Converts between Gregorian dates and other calendar systems.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - tacaswell
    - ocefpaf

about.summary: Converts between Gregorian dates and other calendar systems.
